import { Link, useParams, Navigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { products } from "../../data/products"; import './Details.css'; function Details() { const { ID } = useParams(); if(!ID){ return } let product = products.filter((elem) => elem.ID == ID); document.title=`${product[0].article} | SkinNaturals`; return ( <>
  1. Home
  2. Shop
  3. {product.article}

{product[0].article}

{product[0].description}

Max 10 items per order

€ {product[0].price}

Description

{product[0].description}

Components

{product[0].ingredients.map((ingredient)=>`${ingredient}, `)}

) }; export default Details;
